idea-plugin.name: X.509 Cert Buddy
idea-plugin.description:
Alpha version of a toolkit that scans files for X.509 certificates.
It tries to bruteforce decode any Base64 starting with M.
Next it tries to decode the Base64 data and checks if it finds an ASN.1 sequence.
If so, and the length makes sense, it will try to decode an X.509 certificate.
The certificates are placed in a tree view in the tool window.
Here you can view the cert hierarchy and details.

Cert buddy uses hexdump and openssl, and needs those for the plugin to fully function.
Without those applications not all information and functionality will be available

To use this plugin use the action `Display Certs` to display all certs.
Use the tool window to view cert details, debug and/or convert the certs.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• TextPanes readonly
  • Verify certificates
  • Parse certificates with escaped linefeeds in json strings
  • No longer remove certs when reading them from a document
  • Remove duplicate certificates from the tree
  • UI improvements
  • Allow removal of single or all certificates from the tree
  • Allow drop of files with certificates (PEM/BASE64)

action.description: Read all certificates in current file and add them to the x509 Cert Buddy tool window
